column6:
Spacious Bedroom Room. Home-floor to ceiling windows to view large backyard. Fun Midcentury Modern home each bedroom has ensuite. 
7 miles to NRG & 4 miles to Metro Park/Ride
Close to HBU, Rice, UofH, Med Center, Museum District, Galleria, NRG Stadium, Downtown, hiking/biking trails, energy corridor, & Sugar Land off US 59/69.
Diverse metro area set set in lovely 1/2 acre lots!

column9: Lovely bedroom w/ensuite Mid Century Modern Home
